title: Use default property value if database value is null
author: BardonNathan
body_snippet:
I use mRemoteNG with a MySQL database and I tried to add some rows on tblCons without fill all values. When the software updates its connections, an error occured :

    Unable to cast 'System.DBNull' to 'System.String'.

I suggest to use the default value when the value (in the database) is null.

 - mRemoteNG version : 1.77.0.41252

comments.snippet: Triage refresh (P2): this issue has been inactive for a long time. Please retest on the latest build and share reproducible steps, expected vs actual behavior, and logs/screenshots. If there is no confirmation/update, maintainers can close it as stale or not reproducible.
comments.author: robertpopa22
